description: This page provides background needed to take advantage of the capabilities of the MSIS Drug Utilization Datamart. This mart allows the user to develop high-level statistical tables covering Medicaid drug utilization for groups of drugs. This mart does not present data for each National Drug Code (NDC) but summarizes drug payments and claim counts using the MEDISPAN drug groupings developed by Wolters Kluwer Health, Inc.
title: MSIS Drug Utilization Datamart
